root.para: Martin also has other characteristics of a strong control environment:
The bonds are held and serviced by a well-known bank with an investment department that is widely respected.

listitem.para: Management has high integrity and ethical values.
Management philosophy and operating style are commensurate with the demands and needs of a well-regarded business organization.
Management carefully assigns authority and responsibility to appropriate personnel.
Human resource policies and procedures are designed in a way that the most qualified individuals are attracted to the organization, hired, trained, rewarded, and retained.
